title: Part 452 - General Duties, Accountability, and Transparency Provision For Pharmacy Benefit Managers
content:
Part 452 - General Duties, Accountability, and Transparency Provision For Pharmacy Benefit Managers

State Regulations
§ 452.1 - Application
§ 452.2 - Health plan right to an accounting
§ 452.3 - Terms and conditions of contract relating to pharmacy benefit management services provided to health plans
§ 452.4 - Conflicts of interest
§ 452.5 - Compliance Cost Disclosure

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
